name: Fett's Blaster Rifle
Lore: 'Having lost sight of Boba Fett, Luke was surprised by his sudden reappearance.',
Text: 'Deploy on [Cloud City] or [Jabba''s Palace] Boba Fett (may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise). Hidden Weapons is canceled. If Special Delivery not on table, may deploy it from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. May target a character for free. Draw destiny. Target hit, and forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value.',
